attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Joining the European single currency or giving the right to tax citizens to the European Union would be a huge give away of political power from Westminster to Brussels which few people have confidence in and which even fewer hold allegiance to.

By handing such rights away, we give away control of our economy and in doing so the United Kingdom would no longer serve to be a fully sovereign state.
